name: Project Adder
description:
Project Adder is a 2D, rogue-lite, zombie shooting, platformer sandbox. Adder challenges players to manage random weapons, ammo, and abilities while fighting through hordes of zombies on procedurally generated levels. The map resets once the player dies, bringing a new experience with randomized elements to each run.

OPEN SOURCED
Dive deeper into the gameplay with the developer console (toggle with the tilde key `). Explore, experiment, and manipulate gameplay systems to create your own unique scenarios and challenges. Furthermore, the code is fully open-sourced, inviting you to remix, adapt, and construct new content, enabling community-driven evolution of the game.

FEATURES
  • Procedurally Generated Levels: Every death brings a new map and a novel set of challenges.
  • Randomized Gameplay: Navigate through levels with randomized weapons, ammo, and abilities.
  • Unyielding Zombie Hordes: Employ strategic thinking to survive against relentless zombie waves.
